Description:
Job Purpose:Lead the end-to-end implementation of SAP SuccessFactors solution, including project planning, scoping, resources, and timeline management.
Manages the relationship with internal and third parties’ teams and acts as contact point for the workstreams on all queries and support.
Collaborates and communicates with all stakeholders on key activities to drive progress.
Follow-up and control the quality of the delivery throughout the project lifecycleSkills
Skills:
Qualification and/or ExperienceBachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, Business Administration, or a related field.
Master's degree is a plus.
Proven experience (3 years) as a Project Manager, leading SAP SuccessFactors implementation projects.
Ability to syndicate stakeholders around digital issues
Broad understanding of HR processes, related concepts, and techniques
